tool_description: The Website Content Classification API leverages machine learning techniques to classify and categorize text and multimedia content found on websites. It can aid content moderation, filtering, and search functions, and provide insights into popular and relevant content for a specific audience. The API helps improve the efficiency of managing web content and enhances user experience.
name: Website Content Classification API
title: Website Content Classification API

api_list.name: Classification
api_list.description: The "Classification" endpoint of the Website Content Classification API is responsible for automatically classifying and categorizing text and multimedia content found on the web. By analyzing the content of websites, the endpoint can assign relevant categories and tags to the content, making it easier for website owners to manage their content and for users to find the information they are looking for. This endpoint is useful for content moderation, filtering, and search functions, as well as gaining insights into the types of content that are most popular and relevant to a specific audience.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The domain that you want to classify. (ex: https://google.com)
